pullrequest.title: fix cppcheck suppression line on artful

content.raw: I think xenial complains about `fp` here because it doesn't understand that `FAIL()` causes the program to abort. It sees that `fp` is used in this line with the possibility of being `null` as indicated by the check in line 40. Adding a `return` after `FAIL()` may remove the warning.
content.html: I think xenial complains about fp here because it doesn't understand that FAIL() causes the program to abort. It sees that fp is used in this line with the possibility of being null as indicated by the check in line 40. Adding a return after FAIL() may remove the warning.
